definitions.body: lattice, window, sluice (Mish. id.)—´[[א]] Ho 13:3; pl. [[אֲרֻבּוֹת]] 2Ki 7:2 +, cstr. id.. Mal 3:10; [[אֲרֻבּׂת]] Ge 7:11, Ge 8:2; [[אֲרֻבּׂתֵיהֶם]] Is 60:8; — lattice, latticed opening, where smoke escaped Ho 13:3; openings of dove-cote Is 60:8; metaph. of eyes Ec 12:3 (as latticed by lashes ? Hi Now; only here of opening to look through); elsewhere of sluices in sky, opened by ´[[י]], through which rain pours destructively, [[הַשָּׁמַיִם]] ´[[א]] Ge 7:11, Ge 8:2, cf. Is 24:18 ([[מִמָּרוֹם]] ´[[מ]]); but also fertilizing 2Ki 7:2, 2Ki 7:19 ([[בשׁמים]] ´[[א]]); fig. of blessing Mal 3:10 ([[השׁמים]] ´[[א]]).
